page.title: 18SHOPPING
page.content: There are{no}shops in our area now but there used to be two shops, one in {Culkein}and one in{Clashnessie. However they closed down a long time ago and a grocery van started going round{Assynt.}Nearby at{Clachtoll there is a small shop where you can buy milk, bread, and other essentials but most people make a weekly shopping trip to Lochinver where there is a{baker, butcher newsagents etc. There is also a {Post Office}in Stoer where you can buy stationery.Many people have to buy clothes, furniture, carpets etc. from mail order catalogues. Otherwise people have to travel 155 km to{Inverness}for their shopping. Every Thursday a{fish van}brings round locally caught fish, haddock, plaice, smoked fish and shellfish. A {fruit and veg. van}also calls weekly.
